sentences.en: 1.4 million council homes have been sold, mostly to sitting tenants.
sentences.cn: 已经出售了140万套廉租公房，大部分购买者都是房子的承租人。

sentences.en: Back then, women on TV were mostly seen as eye candy.
sentences.cn: 那时候，电视中的女性大多都被看作花瓶。
轿车的大部分部件是金属制造的。

sentences.en: Conservationists are mostly wedded to preserving diversity in nature.
sentences.cn: 自然环境保护主义者大多致力于保持物种的多样性。

sentences.en: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
sentences.cn: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.en: He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
sentences.cn: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

sentences.en: He mostly stayed at home tucking up the children.
sentences.cn: 他主要待在家里，帮孩子们盖好被子睡觉。

sentences.en: Her own twelve pictures sold fairly well, mostly to friends and family.
sentences.cn: 她自己的12幅画卖得相当好，多半卖给了朋友和家人。

sentences.en: In fact, the recordings were mostly unrehearsed improvisations.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这些唱片收录的大部分乐曲都是没排练过的即兴之作。

sentences.en: Patients are mostly referred to hospital by their general practitioners.
sentences.cn: 病人大多数是在他们的全科医生建议下转往医院就医。

sentences.en: She was counting out 30p, mostly in small change, into my hand.
sentences.cn: 她数出了30便士——大部分是零钱——递给了我。

sentences.en: The guests were mostly middle-aged men talking business.
sentences.cn: 顾客多数是些谈正事的中年男子。

sentences.en: The phantom used to appear unexpectedly, but mostly during the winter.
sentences.cn: 那个幽灵过去常常出人意料地出现，但是大多在冬季。

sentences.en: The scheme mostly benefits people in the North and Midlands.
sentences.cn: 该方案主要的受益者是北部和中部地区的人们。

sentences.en: There was mostly silence. I have never known such economy with words.
sentences.cn: 大部分时候都是沉默，我还从未见过如此惜字如金的情形。

sentences.en: There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
sentences.cn: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.en: They feed mostly on decaying vegetable matter.
sentences.cn: 它们大多以腐烂的蔬菜为食。

sentences.en: Timothy was crying, mostly from exhaustion, and his nose was running.
sentences.cn: 由于太累了，蒂莫西哭的一把鼻涕一把泪。

words.tran_cn: 大部分的，多数的；最多的

trans.tran_en: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc
